CustomField.formula: IF(ProcessCarbon__c, 'Carbon : ', '') + IF(ProcessCNC__c ,'CNC : ', '') + IF(ProcessDMLS__c ,'DMLS : ', '') + IF(ProcessFDM__c,'FDM : ', '') + IF(ProcessInjectionMolding__c,'Injection Molding : ', '') + IF(ProcessMJF__c,'MJF : ', '') + IF(ProcessSheetMetal__c, 'Sheet Metal : ', '') + IF(ProcessSLA__c,'SLA : ','')+ IF(ProcessSLS__c,'SLS : ', '') + IF(ProcessUrethaneCasting__c, 'Urethane Casting', '')
CustomField.label: Process
